name: Argentina
startIntroPart2: Ok fine... Then can I get the Malvinas?
declaringWar: I need to do this, for the sake of progress. You were never my friend.
attacked: Ha! You think you can defeat me? Don't you know we are better than you?
defeated: You are just another nation, this victory will not change that, because you did not deafeat me, I gaved up.
introduction: I am julio Roca, leader of Argentina. We'll treat you with honor and respect, if you do the same.
hateHello: Will you treat me how I deserve?!
tradeRequest: I know you want this trade, I'm sure of that.

name: Bolivia
startIntroPart1: *1880* Bolivia, where are you going? This  is  YOUR  war!!
startIntroPart2: *Now* Pleasegive me sea please, please please please please!
declaringWar: After hard thought, Bolivia has no other choice. War is upon us.
attacked: Come here, is this what you want? Well then... then you looked for it.
defeated: Couldn't you leave alone? Couldn't you!?
introduction: Hello there, call me Belzu please. Now, tell about your people please.
hateHello: Will you give me what I deserve?!
tradeRequest: I'm sure your and my people will love this new products!
uniques: Provides 1 happiness per 2 additional social policies adopted

name: Brazil
declaringWar: The empire of Brazil shall destroy your ill nation.
attacked: The only thing I worry for, is for the people affected by this.
defeated: This is unfortunate, after all, you are the victor.
introduction: I am Pedro the II, emperor of Brazil. Peace and prosperity for our nations.
tradeRequest: I'm happy to anounce this trade offer.
uniques: [+2 Culture] from every [Lumber mill] once [Acoustics] is discovered

name: Colombia
startIntroPart1: Mmmm, delicius, thanks God I invented the arepa.
startIntroPart2: Hey, Hey! Come back here! That´s my money.
declaringWar: Prepare to lose your empire of opression!
attacked: You will see how fruitless this will be for you. Wait and see.
defeated: I hope you treat my people good, don´t take away their happiness.
introduction: Greetings! This is Colombia, wordeful land of riches and diversity. Want a coffee?
tradeRequest: I  thought you might be intested in this...

name: Chile
declaringWar: If it´s necesary to cross The Andes to destroy you, my army is willing to do it.
attacked: From the desert to the Patagonia, we will defend our homeland whatever it costs
defeated: We haven´t managed to defend our homeland. This lands are now yours. Goodbye.
introduction: Welcome to our lands. I hope that our nations grow strong and in peace.
hateHello: Could you have at least have some respect to my nation?!
tradeRequest: Let´s negotiate, we have resources that interest both of us
uniqueText: +2 Gold and +2 Production for every Quarry

name: Mexico
startIntroPart1: He... He... my gastronomy is great.
startIntroPart2: Do I need to remind you of my Cuy,Huancayo, ceviche platter, Ocopa...
declaringWar: First comes the homeland, therefore you must not be in my way.
attacked: Mexicans! Prepare to defend our homeland!
defeated: Nooo, everything I did was for our motherland
introduction: Good morning, I'm Benito Juarez. Come with me and see our nation.
tradeRequest: Could you accept this trade offer?

name: Paraguay
startIntroPart1: How are you not ad about not having sea?
startIntroPart2: Well I actualy have sea, I can go there with my river!
declaringWar: I hate your idea of justice, if justice is need to be done, I am more than willing to do it.
attacked: If war is what you want, war you will have.
defeated: We did our best, we resisted untill the end, however... you won.
introduction: Greetings. I am Gaspar Rodrigez, avenger of the rightful and defender of my people. Who are you?
tradeRequest: You want this, I want that. Deal?

name: Peru
startIntroPart1: You silly, you think yoour food is better than mine?! Your food is the worst among all, pidgeon eater!
startIntroPart2: Ok whatever. It's getting late for me to claim my gastronomy trophie.
declaringWar: Great lands ruled by a weak lider. Contemplate my army marching over my new lands.
attacked: I will give you one of the best wars on history! And the worst defeat in yours.
defeated: History repeats it self. Therefore, Peru shall rise again.
introduction: Greetings. I am Martin Vizcarra, president of Perú. I hope you can become a valuable ally.
tradeRequest: Look at all these goods! We should trade, don't we?

name: Venezuela
startIntroPart1: Stupid Colombia, he thinks he invented the arepa.
declaringWar: Your nation is a danger for our sovereignty.
attacked: Expect a ferocious battle, which you won´t win.
defeated: I have failed you Venezuela!... I have failed you.
introduction: A pleasure to meet you, I am Marco Pérez, president of Venezuela. I hope we get along.
tradeRequest: I hope you accept this; ¡it´s practically a gift!
